data.eml:eml: The genus Folsomides Stach (Collembola, Isotomidae) in Kermanshah Province (W Iran) with the description of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Arbea, Javier I., Kahrarian, Morteza (2015): The genus Folsomides Stach (Collembola, Isotomidae) in Kermanshah Province (W Iran) with the description of two new species. Zootaxa 3925 (2): 281-290, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3925.2.9
